Topic.Title: Quest takes forever to load a save game (Barbarian)

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I have a problem, and since there seems to be no technical support section in this forum, I'll just write it down here.

I've downloaded the game Barbarian, but I cannot load savegames anylonger, or rather Quest needs an eternity in order to load the save game.

The file itself has a size of 2.3 MB.
I don't know, but is this normal for text-based adventure save games?
Because it seems kinda huge. 

Hope that someone can help me with that problem.
